{% endraw %}

Video utils

Use this function to crop a video

{% raw %}

trim_video[source]

trim_video(video, start, end, outfile=None)

Crop a video in place from start to end. If you don't want to crop inplace, provide output filename. For youtube videos you can download_youtube_video before cropping it

{% endraw %} {% raw %}
{% endraw %} {% raw %}

get_resolution[source]

get_resolution(video)

Get the resolution of a video

{% endraw %} {% raw %}
{% endraw %} {% raw %} 
get_resolution('Anna.mp4')

(1280, 720)
{% endraw %} {% raw %}

get_fps[source]

get_fps(video)

Get the fps of a video

{% endraw %} {% raw %}
{% endraw %} {% raw %} 
get_fps('Anna.mp4')

30
{% endraw %}

Audio utils

{% raw %}

trim_audio[source]

trim_audio(audio, start, end, outfile=None)

Crop an audio in place from start to end. If you don't want to crop inplace, provide output filename.

{% endraw %} {% raw %}
{% endraw %}
